mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONCAT(A1.group_ID, A1.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_KEY, ##카테고리 키 (그룹 + 키 형태로 카테고리분류) CASE A1.category_parent_LV WHEN 0 THEN A1.category_detail_NM WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT(A2.category_detail_NM,' > ', A1.category_detail_NM) WHEN 2 THEN CONCAT(A3.category_detail_NM, ' > ', A2.category_detail_NM,' > ', A1.category_detail_NM) END as CATEGORY_NAV FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY A1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY A2 ON A1.CATEGORY_PARENT_LV = A2.CATEGORY_LV AND A1.CATEGORY_DETAIL_PARENT_LV = A2.CATEGORY_DETAIL_LV AND A1.GROUP_ID = A2.GROUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY A3 ON A2.CATEGORY_PARENT_LV = A3.CATEGORY_LV AND A2.CATEGORY_DETAIL_PARENT_LV = A3.CATEGORY_DETAIL_LV ORDER BY CATEGORY_NAV ASC ) C ON P.PROD_CATEGORY = C.CATEGORY_KEY WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
